content:
Hi, got a question regarding the syncing status endpoint https://ethereum.github.io/beacon-APIs/#/Node/getSyncingStatus 

What should the behaviour be for this endpoint if EL is offline? I am asking because in Teku we use that endpoint for determining a VC failover and was interested how other clients have implemented it in cases of an offline EL.

content: `baseFeePerGas` -- do you mean a different field? this one is required in all of the `ExecutionPayload` versions
